body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting our customer service. My name is Eric Anderson, and I work for Express Auto Sales. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, Eric! My name is Diane Rivera.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Diane! How may I assist you today? Could you please provide me with your phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, six seven eight, nine zero one two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Diane. One more thing, could you also share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Diane! Is there anything else you would like to share or ask about today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your assistance, Eric.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Diane. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
